name: Zen Shark
description:
A whale shark avoiding getting stressed out, and saving adorable kitties.

Swim across the ocean by the East Asian coast, avoid junk and getting stressed out, and make chonky cat friends along the way.

Made in 3 days for the Jamifesto Game Jam!

Features:

- An endless ocean, with varying island types

- Plus-size kittens on boats

- An East Asian Setting

- Music

- A real-time scoring tracker


Credits:

Developed by: Rhys Anthony

Concept Artists: Niya Denkova and Sam Direksoonthonsanoh

Assets by: Christabel Lai and Megan Griib

Sounds Via ZapSplat
